## ps2elastic

ps2elastic is an helper to load data from a prestashop database into elasticsearch.

### Synopsis

ps2elastic is an helper to load data from a prestashop database into elasticsearch.

### Options

```
  -b, --debug           debug mode.
  -g, --generate-docs   generate documentation.
  -h, --help            help for ps2elastic
  -v, --verbose         verbose output.
```
